description: Delete a job production plan project phase revenue item.
permissions: Requires permission to delete job production plan project phase revenue items for the related job production plan; access is delegated to the associated job production plan policy.
side_effects: Deletes the job production plan project phase revenue item and triggers post-commit work that updates related project phase cost item actuals, caches cost-code matches, and generates a job production plan recap asynchronously.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. --confirm is required to delete.
